example[0]: Losing weight is an indirect result of smoking cigarettes.
example[1]: The indirect effects of climate change may be profound.
definition[1]: an indirect way to a place is not the straightest way
example[2]: They took an indirect route, avoiding the town centre.
definition[2]: not saying or showing something in a clear definite way
